body_html:
thank you Aselle

  • Yes, no problem with it
  • Unfortunately that's part of my approach. I am using nvidia-docker to decouple the whole thing and running from containers in AWS.
  • I will follow your advice and it'll give a try to previous versions.

thank you Aselle

Yes, no problem with it

body:
thank you Aselle
- Yes, no problem with it
- Unfortunately that's part of my approach. I am using nvidia-docker to decouple the whole thing and running from containers in AWS.
- I will follow your advice and it'll give a try to previous versions.
